document_data.name: Little Stone Bridge
document_data.mainbody: The '''Little Stone Bridge''' was found just outside of the city of [[Manass]] in [[Khazari]].
document_data.Description: The bridge straddled a small river that flowed by Manass on the south and west sides of the city, allowing road access to Manass from the west.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Natives of Manass believed that a powerful [[oni]] used to live beneath the bridge. The oni would attack any travelers crossing the bridge during the cover of darkness. [[Tsikapasmatra]] was believed to have defeated the oni in combat. The oni's treasure was rumored to be buried somewhere near the bridge, but was never discovered. However, this did not stop the locals of Manass from selling treasure maps for the area.
